titleStmt.title: To His Grace James Duke of Ormond, &c. Lord Lieutenant of Ireland, on his return to that government.
titleStmt.author: Wilson, John, 1626-1696.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Brugis, for T. Vere, at the Angel without Newgate,

notesStmt.note: Signed: Jo. Wilson. Licensed Octob. 15. 1677. Roger L'Estrange.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Not that the soul of Poesy was flown ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
